name: FlipJet
description:
A relaxing jet ski racer. There is no goal. Use WASD to move, space to flip and escape to quit

Submission for the 2022 Epic MegaJam (theme: "As Above So Below")

Credits:

"Sci-Fi Jet ski U2 WIP" (https://skfb.ly/6WNAv) by TRYFIELD is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/). - modified slightly

Photo by Adam Lukac from Pexels (used for particle effect): https://www.pexels.com/photo/white-sea-wave-1059979/

Music and sounds from We Love Indies
